title: Acceptable Offerings and Priestly Purity
summary: Leviticus 22 continues the regulations for priests, emphasizing cleanliness when handling sacred offerings. It also details what types of animals are acceptable for sacrifice.

faq.question: What made an offering unacceptable?
faq.answer: Animals that were blind, injured, or had defects could not be offered to God.

faq.question: How were priests to remain holy?
faq.answer: By avoiding impurity and handling offerings only when ceremonially clean.
